title: La Strada: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
other_title_information: Film score from Federico Fellini’s 1954 film
performers: Orchestra Sinfonica di Roma; studio ensembles
label: One Media
notes: Reissue of the original 1954 film score. Chosen for the project because it is a fully documented and publicly accessible manifestation. The original 1954 commercial release of the soundtrack is still under investigation.
